title: Garlic Broccoli With Coco-Peanut Sauce [Vegan, Gluten-Free]
directions: In a skillet saute garlic in olive oil on medium-low heat for 30 seconds until fragrant. Add broccoli and turn heat to med-high. Saute for 3-5 minutes until broccoli is bright green and browning in some spots.
Prepare your sauce. To a small saucepan, add all sauce ingredients. Whisk together over medium low heat until combined, thick, and bubbly.
Spoon generously over broccoli; and rice if desired. If serving with rice noodles, toss to combine.
ingredients: 3 heads broccoli, chopped into florets and small stems
